attributes.action: plant more trees to stop global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all around the world, for every tree we cut down, we should plant 2 more trees. This will save wood and take in lots of c02.  plant enough trees to reduce c02 and stop global warming

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
